title: Manage Team Equipment Logistics
description: An equipment manager needs to coordinate the shipment of all team equipment to an away game.

tasks.description: Generate a complete inventory list of all equipment that needs to be shipped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed packing list.

tasks.description: Book a freight service to transport the equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books a truck for the equipment.

tasks.description: Track the shipment to ensure it arrives at the destination venue on time.
